title: How much isa marks should be there to score 9+ sgpa

comments.body: Depends. Usually it's quite achievable with 40+/50

Around 40-45/50 isa component assuming you do equally well in the ESA i.e 85- 90/100. Maybe a few marks up and down if relative grading.
If you lose more than 15 marks in the ISA component itself then there is a possibility of B and you'll need an A in another subject to compensate.
